DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the Safety of Next Generation Ophthalmic Irrigating Solution compared to BSS Plus for use during cataract surgery in Pediatric patients.
DOC.brief_title: Safety of NGOIS Compared to BSS Plus in Pediatric Patients
DOC.criteria: Cataract present. Other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply. As per age requirements. Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply.
